extendedInfo.description: We have created the most complete flower and plants application in the app store, it will accommodate the enthusiastic gardener looking to plan their next addition to their garden or the novice gardener just starting out.   The application has an extensive range of growing guides for  bulbs, perennials, shrubs, evergreens and climbers, giving detailed information on soil preparation, cultivation and propagation. It allows plants to be added to a favourites list for later lookup and it is very simple to use and fast.

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: Far too few plants to be useful , not even a petunia or a pansy or viola
reviews.author: john owen-jones

reviews.title: Do not install
reviews.comment: Just seems not to work, even i have internet connection enabled through 3g and wifi, it always say \'internet connection disabled\' and closes automatically.
reviews.author: Vishal Bhatt
